p: You see I was 16 when Ollie was born, so I can easily remember his age!! I did believe his birthday was in Aug! Am so eager to get your curtains etc. They sill "revive" this Home with the cheerfulness of their bright color. Hilda sent me some beautiful cretonee, which I am using for pillows and lampshade. So glad you want us up there. May be we could use your basement to cast our sea nymph in??
